entries.name: OpenSSL::OCSP::SingleResponse.new(der_string) → SingleResponseclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Creates a new SingleResponse from der_string.

entries.name: cert_status → Integerclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the status of the certificate identified by the certid. The return value may be one of these constant:

entries.name: certid → CertificateIdclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the CertificateId for which this SingleResponse is.

entries.name: check_validity(nsec = 0, maxsec = -1) → true | falseclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Checks the validity of thisUpdate and nextUpdate fields of this SingleResponse. This checks the current time is within the range thisUpdate to nextUpdate.

entries.name: extensions → Array of X509::Extensionclick to toggle source
next_update → Time | nilclick to toggle source

revocation_time → Time | nilclick to toggle source
to_der → Stringclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Encodes this SingleResponse into a DER-encoded string.
